name: CUSTOM WATERCOLORS - HOLIDAY CUT OFF 11/3 (USA ORDERS)
description:
ORDERS PLACED AFTER 11/3/13 WILL NOT BE READY FOR HOLIDAY DELIVERY. 

Custom pencil & watercolor sketches on archival 140 lb watercolor paper. Finished size 5.5 x 8.5" - unframed.

*I do not draw men or older boys right now. Sorry!* 

1 person (female adult, female or male child) $85
Add'l female/male children $40/each
Add'l female adults $60/each
Favorite toy or stuffed animal add'l $10/each

PRICES ARE FOR PERSONAL ORDERS ONLY. Custom art for business purposes (blogs, logos, etc) can be quoted upon request.

NOTE CARDS can be added on for an additional $18 + 3.50 shipping. 
Info here - 

http://sophieandlili.bigcartel.com/product/personalized-watercolor-note-cards


Please email jennifer@sophieandlili.com for more information. Once you know what you would like for your painting, I will invoice you via paypal. You can send photos with suggestions on hair color & style and clothing preferences. 

ORDERS PLACED AFTER 11/3/13 WILL NOT BE READY FOR HOLIDAY DELIVERY.

name: PERSONALIZED WATERCOLOR NOTE CARDS - SHIPPING INC IN PRICE
description:
I've teamed up with Steph Weibring of joycreativeshop.com to bring you some of my watercolors printed on note cards with matching envelopes! 

**Please specify information in email to jennifer@sophieandlili.com**

Illustration style (number)
Font choice
Font color
Message (name or thank you, etc - up to one line of text please)
Envelope color

12 pc - $21.50 (shipping is $3.50 and included in price)
24 pc - $39.50 (shipping is $3.50 and included in price)
Touch of glitter - $5/per set of 12

Paper size: 4.25x5.5" (includes a2 envelopes - pink or kraft)
Textured soft white stock
Wrapped in cell bags

Please allow up to 3-4 business days

name: Handknit Baby Dolls
description:
Please meet our newest addition to the Sophie & Lili family...hand knit baby dolls! These dolls are each made by hand in Bolivia by a group of skilled artisans.

Black haired baby dolls are 100% baby alpaca & pima cotton details. Spot clean.

Blonde & Brunette babies are hand knit from Peru. Peruvian cotton. 
Spot clean.

Choose from blonde with fair skin or brunette & black haired with medium skin.

name: Hand Knit Dolls
description:
Please meet our newest addition to the Sophie & Lili family...hand knit dolls! These dolls are each made my hand in Bolivia by a group of skilled artisans. 

100% baby alpaca & pima cotton details. Spot clean.
Approximately 13" tall. Soft & hug-able!! 

Choose from blonde with fair skin or brunette & black haired with medium skin. 

Shipping mid-November. More photos to come. PLEASE NOTE - The doll in photos is a sample/prototype. Colors & detail may vary.

(Coupon Code Not Valid)

name: DIY CUT + SEW + COLOR DOLL
description:
Now you can sew your own Sophie & Lili doll. Includes instructions & some of the materials to make one 11" stuffed doll. 

If ordering 9 or more for a party - please email for discounted price. jennifer@sophieandlili.com

Choose a style:

Flower
Peace Sign
Cupcake (birthday)
BFF

Includes:

1 piece doll design fabric front (color yourself)
1 piece of coordinating fabric for back 

Markers sold separately ($6.50 for a Primary color set) 

You will also need:

Polyfil or cotton stuffing
Scissors
Thread
Sewing Machine
Pins

description:

name: Dollface Charm Bracelet & Necklace
description:
Clear acrylic laser cut doll face charms - blonde, brunette pom poms, black pixie cut & redhead. Charms are 1" in height. Printed logo on back.

Choose either hot pink or light pink satin cord - bracelet or necklace length. **These are measured for little girl wrists and necks. Double knot the cord to desired length.

If you need a larger size...please email me!

Packaged in a muslin bag stamped with Sophie & Lili logo. 

ON SALE 

Bracelet - $10 - now $6
Necklace - $13 - now $8

name: *NEW* MISHA LULU + SOPHIE & LILI
description:
So proud to announce this limited edition collaboration with the fabulous children's brand Misha Lulu. I have been a fan of the line for years! Karen provided the artwork, fabric and art direction for these 4 styles. (http://www.mishalulu.com/)

Black & white striped "Classic Dress" with circus theme back fabric

Yellow dot "Happy Misha" dress with baby fine patchwork corduroy back fabric

Pink & black stripe "Madelaine Dress" with hot air balloon fabric on back

Striped "Stars Tunic" with stars, pink skirt & flower. Backed with circus fabric. 

These dolls measures 12"

(If you would like a name on back, please add personalized custom message to your order $2)

Allow 5-7 business days for all custom dolls.

100% cotton. SPOT CLEAN ONLY.

name: BUILD YOUR OWN HAIR ACCESSORIES
description:
Choose any combination to create the perfect set of pigtail holders!

Please specify (in the message box when checking out):

Your 2 design choices

Elastic color* (pink, red, orange or aqua)

*I will try my best to accommodate the clip or elastic color of choice.

name: PRINTABLE BDAY INVITE
description:
This is a self-print birthday invite (PDF). You can print as many or as few as you need! 

The template is an 8.5" x 11" PDF with 3 4 x 6" cards that you cut out yourself (crop marks to guide you)

I recommend a 65 lb. cover stock or heavier & round the corners with a hand-held Fiskars (or similar) corner puncher.

These invites fit an A6 envelope (not included). A great place for colorful envelopes - www.paper-source.com

When you place your order, in the notes to seller box please provide the details for your customized invitation. Please provide:

GIRL STYLE  - From the style chart, please specify:
Hair color
Skin color
Hair style

NAME
DATE OF PARTY
LOCATION
RSVP by date & phone and/or email address


I will email the PDF template within 24-48 hours of payment. Please specify an e-mail address when you order.

Copyright 2011 - all images are the property of S+L. Cards are for personal use only.

name: PRINITABLE THANK YOU CARDS
description:
This is a self-print thank you card (PDF). You can print as many or as few as you need! 

The template is an 8.5" x 11" PDF with 4 4 x 5" cards that you cut out yourself (crop marks to guide you)

I recommend a 65 lb. cover stock or heavier & round the corners with a hand-held Fiskars (or similar) corner puncher.

These cards fit an A2 envelope (not included). A great place for colorful envelopes - www.paper-source.com

When you place your order, in the notes to seller box please provide the details for your customized invitation. Please provide:

GIRL STYLE  - From the style chart, please specify:
Hair color
Skin color
Hair style

NAME

I will email the PDF template within 24-48 hours of payment. Please specify an e-mail address when you order.

Copyright 2011 - all images are the property of S+L. Cards are for personal use only.
